title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Cognitive Apprenticeship-Based Self-Directed Learning for Healthcare Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic theoretical knowledge in healthcare and at least three years of practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex problems in healthcare settings using expert-level cognitive and metacognitive strategies.
Learners can systematically model and explain clinical decision-making processes using digital simulation tools.
Learners can continuously improve their problem-solving processes through feedback-based reflective practice.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
